block.p: 1-bedroom, 1-bath, 949-sq.-ft. condo in a prewar building; renovated kitchen and baths, oversize windows, washer/dryer; common charge $471, taxes $5,076; listed at $455,000, 34 weeks on market (broker: Douglas Elliman)

1-bedroom, 1-bath, 949-sq.-ft. condo in a prewar building; renovated kitchen and baths, oversize windows, washer/dryer; common charge $471, taxes $5,076; listed at $455,000, 34 weeks on market (broker: Douglas Elliman)

3-bedroom, 2 1/2-bath, 2,000-sq.-ft. co-op in a postwar building; 24-hr. doormen, dining room, marble baths, hardwood floors; maintenance $2,945, 50% tax-deductible; listed at $1.255 million, 2 weeks on market (broker: G. Laurie Cooper Inc.)

3-bedroom, 2-bath, 1,500-sq.-ft. condo in a postwar building; 24-hr. doormen, dining area, windowed kitchen, marble baths, balcony, central air-conditioning, 3 exposures; common charge $1,282, taxes $8,100; listed at $799,000, 13 weeks on market (broker: Corcoran Group)

2-bedroom, 2-bath, 1,250-sq.-ft. condo in a postwar building; 24-hr. doormen, concierge, dining area, hardwood floors, 3 exposures, washer/ dryer in unit; common charge $648, taxes $7,656; listed at $599,000 (multiple bids), 1 week on market (brokers: Bette Bregman; Douglas Elliman)

2-bedroom, 2-bath, 1,250-sq.-ft. co-op in a postwar building; 24-hr. doormen, concierge, dining area, hardwood floors, health club in building; maintenance $1,919, 53% tax-deductible; listed at $775,000, 4 weeks on market (brokers: Bellmarc Realty; Klara Madlin Real Estate)

3-bedroom, 2-bath, 1,200-sq.-ft. co-op in a prewar building; hardwood floors, gallery kitchen, private back yard; maintenance $1,017, 50% tax-deductible; listed at $349,000, 16 weeks on market (broker: Corcoran Group Brooklyn)

3-bedroom, 1 1/2-bath, 1,250-sq.-ft. co-op in a prewar limestone building; dining room, dishwasher, washer/ dryer, fireplace, tin ceilings, parquet floors; maintenance $590, 50% tax-deductible; listed at $429,000, 2 weeks on market (broker: Brooklyn Properties of Seventh Avenue)

4-bedroom, 2 1/2-bath, 19-year-old colonial-style house; dining room, eat-in kitchen, 2 fireplaces, rear deck, 1/4-acre lot; taxes $19,020; listed at $999,000 (negotiated amenities), 10 weeks on market (brokers: Houlihan Lawrence; Coldwell Banker/Country Properties)

4-bedroom, 3 1/2-bath, 8-year-old colonial-style house; dining foyer, eat-in kitchen, cathedral ceilings, family room, rear deck, 2-car garage, 1/4-acre lot; taxes $6,450; listed at $400,000, 8 weeks on market (broker: Coldwell Banker/Realty Stars)

5-bedroom, 5 1/2-bath house on a 47.6-acre estate; dining room, 2 living rooms and libraries, family room, heated pool and pool house, caretaker's house, 8-car garage; taxes $40,528; listed at $15 million, 17 weeks on market (brokers: Coldwell Banker/Greenwich; Ogilvy & Associates)

6-bedroom, 3-year-old colonial-style house with 6 full and 2 half baths; dining room, eat-in kitchen with pantry, family room, library, steam shower and sauna, 2 fireplaces, central air-conditioning, 3-car garage, 2.1-acre lot; taxes $22,723; listed at $1.975 million, 7 weeks on market (brokers: William Pitt Real Estate; Country Living Associates)
